__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''New bugs without a package'''! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===
During hug days you can also participate in <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki>!  To identify your work as part of the hug day follow these steps:

* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-'''20090212'''
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-'''20090212'''

=== Guidance ===

Our goal is to at a minimum assign these bug reports to the correct package.  Ideally, we will start gathering detailed information regarding the bug too.

For helpful hints regarding which package to assign a bug report to see <nowiki>[[Bugs-FindRightPackage| finding the right package]]</nowiki>.

You can find package specific debugging information at <nowiki>[[DebuggingProcedures|Debugging Central]]</nowiki>.

For problem specific Stock Responses see: <nowiki>[[Bugs-Responses]]</nowiki>

=== New Bugs without a package ===
'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
* Assign the bug to the correct package
* Request any needed information, subscribe yourself to the bug, and change the status to Incomplete '''or'''
* Document how to recreate the bug if necessary, and change the status to Confirmed
